title: In record heat for November, Kenyans dominate the New York City Marathon.
description: In their New York debuts, Sharon Lokedi ran a fearless race to win the women’s marathon, while her compatriot Evans Chebet took a patient approach to capture the men’s title.
dc:creator: Scott Cacciola

media:content.media:credit: Ben Solomon for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Sharon Lokedi of Kenya, middle, unexpectedly won the women’s race with a time of 2:23:23
